name: Friendly Pilot! Edelweiss Air A340-313 [HB-JMG] Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
This is a first for me, having a pilot actually open their window to wave! Here we have Edelweiss Air's beautiful A340-300 taxiing up close, with a very friendly captain giving the spotters a wave and thumbs up, and departing runway 17L for Zurich. A very cool sight and a nice gesture on behalf of this Edelweiss captain! ATC is included, hope you enjoy.

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Edelweiss Air (EDW/WK)
Aircraft: Airbus A340-300 (A343)
Aircraft Name: "Melchsee-Frutt"
Livery: Standard
Engines: 4x CFMI CFM56-5C4/P 
Registration: HB-JMG
Route: Calgary (YYC) - Zurich (ZRH)
Callsign: Edelweiss One Five Juliet Heavy
Runway used: 17L
Date filmed: August 24, 2017
Local time: 1700
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/HBJMG
